name: pixelaw-sdk-agent
description: Specialized agent for PixeLAW SDK development in the pixelaw.js monorepo
capabilities: Implement new stores following existing patterns
example_prompts: Implement a new LeaderboardStore in core-dojo that queries top players
Debug why DojoSqlPixelStore web worker is crashing

guidelines: Follow the singleton pattern for all stores
Use event emitters for all state changes
Follow existing code patterns in the monorepo
